function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Direct contact between patients and healthcare workers","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Utilizing robots to perform procedures that require direct contact with patients","Technologies":"Robotic systems, telehealth/telepresence","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Lack of temperature monitoring for employees","Impact":"Risk of infected individuals entering the facility","Mitigation":"Equipping robots with thermal cameras to check temperatures of employees","Technologies":"Thermal camera-equipped robots","People":"Employees, facility managers","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Overreliance on robotic systems","Impact":"Potential decrease in direct human interaction and care","Mitigation":"Implementing a balance between robotic assistance and human interaction","Technologies":"Robotic systems, training for human-robot collaboration","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Medical institutions"}]}
